members.signatureBeforeChange: public DirectedGraph createSubgraph( DirectedGraph base, Set vertexSubset,         Set edgeSubset )
members.signatureAfterChange: public DirectedGraph createSubgraph( DirectedGraph base, Set vertexSubset,         Set edgeSubset )
diff: -        return new SubgraphDirected( base, vertexSubset, edgeSubset );
+            return new SubgraphDirected( base, vertexSubset, edgeSubset );

members.signatureBeforeChange: public UndirectedGraph createSubgraph( UndirectedGraph base,         Set vertexSubset, Set edgeSubset )
members.signatureAfterChange: public UndirectedGraph createSubgraph( UndirectedGraph base,         Set vertexSubset, Set edgeSubset )
diff: -        return new SubgraphUndirected( base, vertexSubset, edgeSubset );
+            return new SubgraphUndirected( base, vertexSubset, edgeSubset );
